Vanilla Historical Sight Presets V1.4

/Changelog
Fine-tuned and renamed many presets, and added two new presets. Oplot, DefaultPlus2.

/Explanation
Replicate the historical GPS or FCS look of tanks using the sights provided in War Thunder.

Sight thickness, font size, color, transparency, layout, crosshairs, which cannot be adjusted within the game, have been adjusted.

There are 25 sight presets, mainly for MBT and IFV.
Includes all presets from previous version.

This preset was created to replicate historical sights but with an emphasis on practical...
